title: Integrated Thinking Training for Decision-Making and Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Context-based learning utilizing mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically derive solutions to social problems using normative approaches (e.g., decision-making matrices)
Learners can make judgments considering emotional factors in complex decision-making situations through naturalistic approaches (e.g., scenario-building)
Learners can create and present portfolios documenting decision-making processes for real-world social problems through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
